other_tests.findings: Patient exhibited command auditory hallucinations, tangential thought processes, and a full range of delusions including persecutory and ideas of reference.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Rapid response to neuroleptic treatment led to improvements in concentration, judgment, and social engagement within 72 hours.

other_tests.findings: Full neurological workup, including a CT scan of the head, resulted in negative findings.
Physical examination and all laboratory tests were within normal limits.
